changes.title: A clear Transaction History
description: Your wallet now gives you a complete, transparent view of every transaction - making it easier to track how your Peer Tokens move.

changes.title: Each transaction includes:
description: Total Peer Token amount (including fees)
Fee breakdown (Peer Bank, Burns, Inviter)
Date and time stamp
Message (if added)
You can expand any transaction to see full details, or collapse it to keep things clean.
This is the first iteration of Transaction History. Some transaction types (such as Daily Mint) are not included yet and will be added in a future update.
For now, most transactions shown are from the last month. Older transactions will be migrated and made visible in the next iteration.
Everything you earn or spend is now easier to track, understand and trust.

changes.title: Send Peer Tokens with a Personal Touch
description: Transferring Peer Tokens just got more expressive
You can now add an optional message when sending Peer Tokens to another user, whether it’s a thank-you, a shoutout, or just an emoji.

changes.title: What’s new in the transfer flow:
description: Add a note up to 500 characters (letters, numbers, emojis & most symbols allowed)
Clear transaction summary before sending
Improved error messages that guide you to the next step
Messages appear in both users’ Transaction History
Safe, transparent, and now more personal

changes.title: Updated EULA
description: Our terms now reflect the new moderation and safety rules

changes.title: Report Profiles, Posts & Comments
description: You can now report any profile, post, or comment that breaks the rules
Reported items may become blurred and hidden if 5 or more users flag them

changes.title: Moderation Improvements
description: New in-app moderation tools to review reported content faster and keep the community safe

changes.title: Illegal content rules
description: Content marked as "Illegal" is fully removed across Peer
No views, likes, comments, or reports allowed
Hidden for everyone (including the owner)
Cannot be engaged with, restored, or promoted

changes.title: Updated EULA
description: Our terms now reflect the new moderation and safety rules

changes.title: Post Promotion with Peer Tokens
description: Pinned Ads: promote any post to the top of its feed (media, video, or music) for 24 hours
Cost: 200 Peer Tokens per promotion
Instant activation: ads start immediately after payment
Flexible cancellation: cancel anytime before checkout

changes.title: Ad Performance Tracking
description: My Ads dashboard: track all your promotions in one place
Detailed stats: monitor views, likes, comments, and Gems earned
Ad history: view both active and ended promotions

changes.title: Authentication & Account Updates
description: Invite code required: registration now requires an invite from a friend or code from Peer to maintain community quality
"Remember me" fixed: reliable sign-in across sessions
Password reset made easy: smoother flow with better data validation for quick account recovery
Legal updates: refreshed Privacy Policy and End-User Licence Agreement
Unified experience: consistent designs and flows across iOS, Android, and Web

changes.title: New Features
description: Add up to 20 photos per post
Titles: up to 63 characters
Text post descriptions: up to 20,000 characters
Media post descriptions: up to 500 characters
Max upload size: 500MB total with helpful guidance when limits are exceeded
Release notes in-app (web and Android): tap the version number to view release notes, version history, and documentation

changes.title: Bug Fixes
description: Comment count now accurately reflects the number of visible and retrievable comments
All comments now correctly display commenter's avatar, username, and ID
Fixed duplicate posts appearing in dashboard feed
User avatars now load properly in the interactions list
Profile pictures correctly shown in Following, Followers, and Peers lists
Fixed wallet flow issue preventing users without enough tokens from getting stuck on transfer actions
